qa.question: Which holidays are the important ones in the religion with places of worship Masjid Hamza and Valley Stream?
qa.answer: ['Eid al-Fitr Eve', 'Eid-Ul-Adha Eve', 'Eid al-Adha', "Lailat al Mi'raj", 'Nuzul Al-Quran', 'Eid al-Fitr', 'Day of Arafat', 'Day of Ashura', 'Mourning of Muharram', 'Laylat al-Qadr', 'Barat Night', 'Mawlid', 'Ramadan', 'Islamic New Year', 'Night of Wishes']
